name: One Last Drive
description:
You are in charge of collecting what is left of the outside world in the barren desert. Bring back as much as you can collect before your car breaks up!

I'm looking for a good royalty-free music to go along with the game, so until then, please play any good music that matches your taste (also mentioned in the included readme file)!

/// Instructions ///

  • Drag to move vehicle
  • Collect resources
  • You must Bring the resources back to the Bunker (location indicated by red arrow) in order to convert your cargo into scores! Plan your route wisely!
  • Also, you can go collect the resources multiple times

a submission for the 37th GM48 Jam.
